

#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;
int gcd(int,int);
void scan(int &x){
      register int c=getchar();
      x=0;
      for(;(c<48|| c>57);c=getchar());
       for(;c>47 &&c<58;c=getchar()){
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-48;
       }
       }


int gcd(int a,int b){
    int temp,d;
if(a>b){
    temp=a;
    a=b;
    b=temp;


}
if(a==1 || b==1) return 1;

else {
    while(b%a!=0){
            temp=a;
        a=b%a;
        b=temp;
}
    return a;
}
}

int main(){

int t,z;
scan(t);

for(z=1;z<=t;z++){

    int n,l,r,q,i=0,x=0,d=0;


    scan(n);
    scan(q);
     int a[n+1];
     int b[n+1];
     int c[n+1];


    for(i=1;i<=n;i++) scan(a[i]);
    b[1]=a[1];
    c[n]=a[n];
    for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
        b[i]=gcd(b[i-1],a[i]);


    for(i=n-1;i>0;i--)
           c[i]=gcd(c[i+1],a[i]);
           for(x=1;x<=q;x++){
            scan(l); scan(r);
            if(l==1){  d=c[r+1];}
            else if(r==n)d=b[l-1];
            else {
                d=gcd(b[l-1],c[r+1]);
            }
            printf("%d\n",d);
           }
}
return 0;



}
